Title: The Lady
Writer: Carson Mell, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Carson Mell (executive story editor), Amy Aniobi (story editor), Dan Lyons (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: Richard butts heads with Erlich over a prospective hire; Dinesh and Gilfoyle grow suspicious.
